item.title: Display Jupyter Notebooks with Academic
item.description: Learn how to blog in Academic using Jupyter notebooks

item.title: HONORS & AWARDS
item.description: 2012 OIC Scholarship for undergraduate study, Islamic University of Technology. 2014 Champion, IUT Computer Programming Contest. 2014 Honorable Mention, Human Expedition on Mars Timeline 2018. 2016 2nd/100 in Inter University Programming Contest, Daffodill International University ACM ICPC world finals warmup contest 2016 2016 6th/100+ in Inter University Programming Contest, NSU Cybernauts National Programming Contest 2019 NTU Research Scholarship, Fully funded Ph.

item.title: News
item.description: 2021 5-May Two paper got accepted in ACL-IJCNLP-2021 . 2020 6-Nov Get back to the PhD study after completing my internship with Amazon Lex Team. 15-Oct Our paper LNMap is accepted in EMNLP-2020. 03-Aug I will be starting my internship at Amazon, with Lex Team. 28-Aug Passed my PhD Qualifying Examination (QE). 28-Apr Preprint of our new paper LNMap released in Arxiv.

item.title: Academic: the website designer for Hugo
item.description: Create a beautifully simple website or blog in under 10 minutes.
